ygData.subject: Trying to add to the confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: Quest #1 Telescope Lens quest.  Originates in wizards guild.  Obtain 4 spare telescope lenses and return to guild master.  Reward in beta was a level 24 spell.
ygData.messageBody:
Quest #1 Telescope Lens quest. Originates in wizards guild. Obtain 4
spare telescope lenses and return to guild master. Reward in beta was a
level 24 spell.

Quest #2 Observer staff quest. Originates in steamfont. Kill 30ish level
Eye, return cornea (lens) and get a staff of the observer in return.

* Pie tins are available in the blue building next to the bank in Free Port
(If I remember correctly)
* You can tinker below level 16 successfully. (Verified last night) Woohoo

* Toolbox is fixed. Mine is sitting in the bank unbagged as we speak.
* Still haven't found any leads on the other tinkering books, and I've been
through most of Freeport now.
* They put a whole lot of new quest/skill related stuff in yesterday. It
may be worthwhile to revisit the vendors in Akanon, Steamfont, and Lesser
Faydark Observitory.

Found out something interesting on stratististics. One of the quests from
Gem Choppers hall (Warriors Guild) rewards people with Tattered armor.
I've only talked to 1 person who has done this quest and he recieved
Tattered cloth arm bands as his reward. Maybe this is the place to obtain
the cloak.

Cheers,
Malkin
